StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesTechTree_Name
StringTable.String: Base Tech Tree

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesTechTree_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The base tech tree.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesTechTree_Dec
StringTable.String: The base tech tree.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPirateBasesTech_Name
StringTable.String: PirateBases

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPirateBasesTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Gives pirates what they need to survive without worlds.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPirateBasesTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Gives pirates what they need to survive without worlds.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEngineeringTech_Name
StringTable.String: Engineering

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Hyperdrives and Tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEngineeringTech_Dec
StringTable.String: For generations, we've looked up at the stars and wondered, "What if?" Well buckle up, because "if" has happened. By bending space around our ships they're able to use conventional propulsion within a pocket of normal space, while accelerating at vastly greater speeds in reality. The stars have gotten closer.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarTravel_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Travel

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensor, life support, and speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarTravel_Dec
StringTable.String: Even at the incredible speeds we can travel at now, if we want to journey anywhere beyond the closest stars, we'll need to make significant improvements to our navigational and life support systems. More refined Hyperdrives wouldn't hurt either.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperdrive Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: After analyzing how our first generation of Hyperdrives have (and haven't) worked, we've come up with a number of ways to improve our ships' speeds.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Transportation Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of Colony & Constructor modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pushing large support modules through space is inherently wasteful. By miniaturizing and optimizing the larger components, we can fit more on a ship, allowing them to go farther and faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Recirculation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: After listening to the complaints and coughs of our returning crews, we've improved the life support recirculation systems of our ships, which should marginally increase their effective range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonDriveTech_Name
StringTable.String: Ion Drive

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonDriveTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Improved Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonDriveTech_Dec
StringTable.String: By using magnetic fields to capture ions from the interstellar medium during Hyperdrive flight, we can funnel this additional mass into the exhaust of our conventional fusion engines, increasing the overall speed and efficiency of the propulsion system. We call these Ion Drives, and they make us go faster, basically.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Drives

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The ion capture technology of our Ion Drives requires a fiendish amount of tuning, which our ship's engineers are only just learning to automate. Once this work is done, we should see slightly higher speeds across our fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Hyperfield generators are no longer the rare pieces of equipment they once were, and we're beginning to see efficiencies of scale in the manufacture of them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIonOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Every year our Hyperdrives get more efficient and smaller. Less room for the engines means more room for everything else, benefiting every type of ship we could conceive of.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Theory

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Advanced Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers are now able to "stack" up the space-bending fields of our Hyperdrives, magnifying the acceleration effect. They call these stacked fields "Warp Fields" and are able to use them to create vastly more powerful engines.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By tuning the arrangement of stacked hyperfields in a variety of dimensions, we've found some surprisingly cheap ways to improve the speed of our Warp Drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Field Generator Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we're using stacked fields and multi-field generators, even the most miniscule improvement in efficiency we find leads to significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Field Generator Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarpFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: With a bit of experience working with the effects of stacked hyperfields, we've determined that we were stacking them inefficiently. Smaller field generators can achieve the same effects as their fatter predecessors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperwarpWaves_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperwarp Waves

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperwarpWaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Exotic Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperwarpWaves_Dec
StringTable.String: A hyperwarp wave creates a cascading series of warp fields at a distance in front of the vessel, allowing the warp drive to effectively compress already compressed space. That glosses over a number of complicated mathematical issues which had to be sorted out to make it work, but our researchers now believe we can begin developing even faster drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperwarpMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Drive Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperwarpMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperwarpMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: No other civilization in the galaxy can match ours for the efficiency and ease with which we build our drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperwarpMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperwarpMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperwarpMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have all but mastered hyperfield technology, and are capable of wringing the best possible speed from even the smallest engines.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesStellarFoldingTech_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Folding

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesStellarFoldingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Ultimate Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesStellarFoldingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Stellar folding is the ultimate extension of hyperfield technology, bending space on a scale never seen before, with hyperfields approaching the diameter of a star. Our ships are now the fastest in the galaxy, and perhaps the fastest the galaxy has ever seen.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperfieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperfield Projection

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperfieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperfieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Careful analysis of the way hyperfield waves interact when ships are traveling in formation has revealed the possibility of building larger field generators capable of increasing the drive efficiency of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesGravityFieldManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Gravity Field Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesGravityFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesGravityFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: It took many decades of effort before our physicists were finally able to find the graviton. It turned out to be inside us the whole time. Inside of everything the whole time, to be technical. Anyways, having harnessed its power, we can now generate large artificial gravity fields, which should greatly increase the maneuverability and tactical options of our ships in combat.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperfieldDisruption_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperfield Disruption

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperfieldDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of enemy speed reduction modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHyperfieldDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: By analyzing the interference effects of multiple hyperwave fields from different ships traveling in close proximity, and combining that with our ability to generate hyperfield effects at ever increasing ranges, we can now limit the speed of enemy ships within the range of a properly equipped starbase.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesStellarFieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Field Projection

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesStellarFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesStellarFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: The Stellar Field Projector allows properly equipped ships to effectively "tow" ships with less capable drives. The same technology will help us improve the hyperfield enhancing capabilities of our starbases.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSurvey_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Survey

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved sensors and survey modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: "Look before you leap," is excellent advice in all sorts of aspects of life and galactic civilization building. Now we finally have the tools to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Amplification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases sensor range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of nano-processors allow us to more rapidly process the massive volumes of information our sensors return, improving the overall effectiveness of our sensor systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensors Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The hyperfield detectors which our sensors use were originally cobbled together from leftover drives. Now that we have dedicated sensor manufacturing equipment, we can expect to see some significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest sensors were crude, jury-rigged things. If we begin swapping out their parts for dedicated sensor-specific equipment, we should see significant weight savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldSensors_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Sensors

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: We've long been able to detect the fields which all ships emit to control their Hyperdrives. Improvements in our understanding of the effects of space folding have revealed that those fields are detectable at much greater distances than previously believed.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Field Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases sensor range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our technicians have found that by turning one of the knobs up, our sensor systems can see a bit further. We feel kind of dumb for not realizing this before.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Efficacy Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Further refinements to our sensor manufacturing process has led to the production of cheaper, more efficient sensors. The accountants are all very excited.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Sensors

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The creation of high-density field detection components should lead to more compact sensors, leaving our ship designers more room to install guns. Everyone wins. Except the people the guns are pointed at.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSubspaceSensors_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Sensors

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSubspaceSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSubspaceSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Subspace is our term for the 12-dimension region of space which lies at right angles to and a little bit behind our universe. It's that place which is just permanently in the corner of your eye, and it took some very smart people a very long time to figure out a way to look at it. The upshot of all this is that it enables us to peer over much longer distances than ever before.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Simplification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: When a ragtag group of science-accountants teamed up with the goal of identifying cost savings in our most advanced sensor systems, few believed they had a chance. Many openly mocked them. Some people spit on them. But somehow, despite all odds, they managed it. And we will all reap the benefits.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSensorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of the latest generation of sensor systems has revealed that several of their components don't technically have to exist in this universe. By shifting their workload into another plane, we can reduce the amount of mass we have to lug around in ours.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesTargetingAssistTech_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Assist

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesTargetingAssistTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and stealth modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesTargetingAssistTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Study of how our ships have performed (and occasionally underperformed) in combat have led to a number of improvements in our tactical targeting systems. At the same time, we've devised a system which should confuse enemy sensors, for even greater tactical benefit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesTargetingSupport_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Support

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesTargetingSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and jamming modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesTargetingSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: We've adapted our tactical sensor improvements into support modules, capable of allowing a single ship to provide the same sensor accuracy and jamming benefits to an entire fleet of vessels.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupport_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems surprising that the factor limiting the travel range for most ships is its life support system, but there you have it. For anything less than a colony ship, keeping the occupants alive is now a bigger challenge than keeping the engines fueled.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Life Support

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases ship range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience with the rigors of space travel, and the shrieked radio transmissions of the few who fell to the rigors of space travel, have revealed a number of small improvements we might be able to make to our existing life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Reducing the cost of building life support systems is one of those necessary things we have to do that we don't want to advertise too much. It's hard enough finding naval recruits as it is.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By minimizing the amount of weight and space our life support systems take up, we leave more room for our life reduction systems, which is what we're now calling guns.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldGeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Generation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: Our growing familiarity with various force field technologies has enabled us to replace our primitive mechanical life support systems with more elegant field based processors. Food is now stored in a single block of nutrient-rich sludge, which should greatly reduce spoilage, as well as the need for utensils, as the fields pipe it directly into the user's mouth.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Support Range Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases ship range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out that by aerating the nutrient sludge we provide our crews it takes up significantly more volume in their stomachs, making them feel full with less food. There are some associated problems with, uh, gas, but we're coming up with special filters to address that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Support Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our life support systems are now really, really cheap. Still effective though, let's not forget that. Maybe let's not even call them cheap. "Economical," or "Value," maybe.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of efficient field generators, and putting our crews on a diet, we've been able to reduce the mass of our life support systems even more.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPromethionSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Promethion Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPromethionSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The Promethion Support System is the logical extension of our support field technologies, with all the requirements for a living organism - oxygen, water, and food - now piped directly into that organism rather than left to float around and get on the equipment.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Support System Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of the crews are finding out how little we're spending on their life support systems. "Do you think we're worthless?" they shout. And we don't, we really don't. They're not worthless at all! Worth less, yes. But that's different.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Support Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLifeSupportMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We've figured out how to coax nutrient sludge to deliver itself to the crew using embedded Promethion field effectors, saving us the weight of carrying around heavy fixed effectors. And the embedded effectors come right out in the waste stream, ready for reuse!

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLosslessSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLosslessSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Our life support systems are now close to perfect, wasting no resources whatsoever, and recycling essentially all generated waste products. As an added bonus, the experience of being surrounded and penetrated by deeply personal fields is now much less humiliating for the crew.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Mastery

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSupportFieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our switch to field based life support systems has revealed the possibility of offloading partial life support requirements to other vessels. Additionally, the minimization of food requirements makes it now possible to supplement fleet range via unmanned supply probes launched from an appropriately equipped facility.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesExplorationExtention_Name
StringTable.String: Exploration Extension

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesExplorationExtention_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesExplorationExtention_Dec
StringTable.String: We've adapted the latest in Promethion support field technology to be used by our fleet-support vessels, increasing a fleet's total potential travel range. Additionally, we've made significant improvements to our starbase life support extension modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalManufacturing_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved manufacturing buildings and Small hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving our ship construction operations to micro-gravity environments will eventually allow for the construction of massive structures. We're not quite there yet, but this, the first step out of the well, was always going to be the biggest.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Skilled Starship Construction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shipyard manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out that you can't just put anyone in a space suit and get them to build things in orbit, because a huge majority of people don't understand what an orbit is. Some improved training programs should dramatically improve our orbital manufacturing capability.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Orbital plane change maneuvers are expensive, and something we want to avoid if we can. Getting material to the right orbit when it needs to be there is a huge challenge which we're only just coming to grips with.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Storage Maximization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Ironically enough, space is at a premium in space, inside of our hulls at least. Even small improvements in packing efficiencies are worth the effort of hunting them down.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Gravity Construction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Medium hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Most of our initial attempts at building structures in micro-gravity environments were clumsy variations of ground-based techniques, not far removed from banging rocks together. Now we have the expertise to design and implement true zero-gravity construction practices, opening the door to a whole new scale of vessels.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Reinforcement

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull hit points.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: After donating a few hulls for weapons practice, we were able to see the structural damage inflicted on them, identifying structural reinforcements that should toughen each ship substantially.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Shipyard Efficiency

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Worksite planning in an orbital environment is a seriously complicated business, but now that we've got the hang of it, we should see significant cost savings for every hull we construct.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: High Capacity Hulls

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesZeroGravityOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our new zero gravity construction program has enabled us to build hollow structural elements which are still able to handle very high compression loads. By maximizing the use of these, and routing various ancillary ship systems through the cavities, we can save space for mission critical equipment.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLargeScaleConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Large Scale Construction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLargeScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Large hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLargeScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Building larger space ship hulls requires a lot more than just adding more stuff to them. Just ensuring that they won't collapse on themselves under acceleration is a serious challenge. Seating arrangements are another key factor, so that the crew doesn't collapse in on themselves under acceleration.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Hardened Hulls

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalConstructionFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull hit points.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems counterintuitive, but by introducing very small weaknesses in the molecular structure of our hulls, we can make them deformable in very controllable ways, which makes them quite a bit more resilient.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Starship Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalConstructionFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of self-propelled manufacturing equipment allows our worker to maneuver inside of hulls with more ease than ever before, reducing the challenge and expense of construction.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Capacity Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalConstructionFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: As our hulls grew ever larger, we began to lose some of the art of packing that our predecessors had. But now thanks to the scale of our ships, even very small improvements in packing can lead to much more room for everything else.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMassiveScaleConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Massive Scale Construction

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMassiveScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Huge hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMassiveScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: We're building some of the largest ships this galaxy has ever seen, capable of blotting out the stars. Obviously any ship can blot out the stars if you get close enough to it. You just don't have to get very close to these ones for that to be the case. Nor would you want to.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Master shipwrights

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: That we build the best ships in the galaxy is undeniable, but that we do it so economically is what's really impressive. Our enemies have never been menaced so thriftily.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Maximization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to advances in the field of bristling, never before have our ships been so bristling with weapons. They could also bristle with other things we suppose. Your choice.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullStrengthening_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Strengthening

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullStrengthening_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tougher hulls.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullStrengthening_Dec
StringTable.String: Using new force field technologies, we've been able to embed strengthening fields within the structures of our vessels, making them substantially more resistant to damage. They also now tingle if you lick them.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullRepairSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Repair Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The same field technology we use to strengthen our ships can be used to conduct partial repairs to them as well, straightening and reinforcing battle-damaged structural elements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSelfHealingHulls_Name
StringTable.String: Self Healing Hulls

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSelfHealingHulls_Dec
StringTable.String: Tiny little self-replicating nanobots are capable of almost anything so long as you don't ask too many questions about them. By installing nanobot repair modules in our ships and starbases, our ships will be able to repair damage during battle itself.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesCarrierTech_Name
StringTable.String: Carriers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesCarrierTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesCarrierTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Carrier based combat allows us to bring many weapons to bear on an enemy from multiple vectors, while keeping our larger capital ships further from the danger. Fighters are a lot more replaceable than capital ships, and there's no shortage of volunteers to fly them. Apparently there's something glamorous about being vaporized in a very small ship.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesCarrierFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesCarrierFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesCarrierFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These little drones are fast and deadly, and more importantly cheap. They also have the added advantage of not requiring a crew, which saves lives.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesCarrierFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Guardian Drones

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesCarrierFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesCarrierFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: These tough little drones will guard our Support and Capital ships to the end; and when they are destroyed, no lives are lost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighCapacityCarriers_Name
StringTable.String: High Capacity Carriers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high-capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighCapacityCarriers_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our latest generation of fighters - designed to be more compact and packable - along with more efficient repair, reloading, and recovery facilities, we've been able to greatly improve the carrying capacity of our carriers.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInterstellarLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: It's one thing to build a ship; it's another thing to keep it running. Whether it's keeping it supplied with fuel, ammunition, or people, there is an awful lot going on behind the scenes to keep a deep-space vessel operational. None of this is exciting of course. Logistics officers are some of the most boring people you're ever likely to meet. But a necessary evil.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLogisticalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLogisticalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLogisticalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a little more practice moving assets around in space, and figured out some of the issues relativistic travel creates with our timekeeping and administration, we've been able to significantly improve our logistical capacity.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLogisticalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Mining

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLogisticalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases mining production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLogisticalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: An asteroid mining operation is an incredibly complicated ballet of activity, as boring machines, ore haulers, and repair drones swarm about an asteroid. Keeping all these pieces moving and operational is a challenging task, and improving the organization of a mining operation is a sure way to improve its output.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLogisticalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Shipyards

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLogisticalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shipyard decay rate.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesLogisticalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Shipyards are, by some measures, the most complicated constructs we have ever created. Any improvements we can make to their management and operations will result in significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesFleetLogisticsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Fleet Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesFleetLogisticsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Scaling up our naval operations to include large multi-vessel fleets has created a number of additional logistical challenges which we're only just now coming to grips with. We'll definitely stop sending ships out without oxygen now though.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDeepSpaceLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Space Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDeepSpaceLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDeepSpaceLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's via unmanned probes, deep space caches, or our network of merchant vessels, keeping our fleets well stocked while our civilization expands has proven to be a tremendous, but still very boring, challenge.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesGalacticLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Logistics

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesGalacticLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases logistics.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesGalacticLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of mass-scale logistics is the envy of the galaxy. Well, the part of the galaxy which gets excited about logistics that is.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarfareTech_Name
StringTable.String: Warfare

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarfareTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of weapons technologies.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarfareTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't be naive about what we might find in the galaxy. Or who. From this point on, our ships must be armed, whether to protect against some yet unseen enemy, or even ourselves.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSystemsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSystemsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The best defense is a good offense. Interestingly, so is the best offense. With that in mind, we've developed a number of weapon systems which should prove very well suited to space-based defense. And, as discussed, offense.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSpecializationTech1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the accuracy of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have increased the targeting systems of our existing weapons substantially, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Name
StringTable.String: Miniturization Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the mass of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Name
StringTable.String: Production Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the cost of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether energy, particles, or both at the same time, there's an awful lot of destructive potential in suddenly sending a lot of them all at one place.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Focused Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of the ultra transparent materials we use in our focusing crystals has made it possible to increase the damage potential of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons will never be cheap, but some economies of scale have led to price reductions in the magnification and focusing equipment these weapons rely upon.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Lacking the requirements for ammunition storage, beam weapons have always been mass-efficient. And after some hard work by the boys and girls in the lab, now they're more so.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMatterDisruption_Name
StringTable.String: Matter Disruption

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMatterDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have been able to weaponize a columnated beam of particles capable of disrupting the strong nuclear force, severing the bonds which hold the nucleus together, turning matter into smaller chunks of matter.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Amplification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in crystallography have created a new generation of focusing crystals capable of handling much greater quantities of energy without fracturing. All of our beam weapons just got a little bit badder.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: For a long time the manufacture of beam weapons was as much art as science, requiring highly trained technicians to individually polish and tune each weapon. By making concentrated efforts to standardize beam weapon manufacturing, we're finally able to automate portions of it, reducing the cost of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The heaviest parts of beam weapons has always been the charge coils and their associated cooling equipment. With the latest generation of super-conductors we can now build these smaller and more compact than ever.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPlasmaProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Plasma Projection

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPlasmaProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to a breakthrough in containment technology, we're now able to generate columnated plasma containment fields at incredible distances. The upshot to this is that we can now send massive quantities of plasma at relativistic velocities in the direction of anything we don't like very much.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Beam Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our supply chain for the creation of plasma containment fields had a couple of kinks that needed to get worked out, but now that we have, we expect to be able to create beam weapons for far less resources.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to push our beam weapons right up to the limits that physics allow. If we want any more power per unit of mass, we may have to move to a different universe.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyPhasing_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Phasing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyPhasing_Dec
StringTable.String: The synthesis of the phaser particle is almost impossible to understand if you don't have several advanced degrees and possibly an extra brain. Suffice to say, by sending a modest quantity of these particles at the enemy, we can induce a chain reaction which breaks matter down into ghostly neutrinos, effectively evaporating it. This is vicious, nasty staff we're working with now, so please be good with it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDoomRayTech_Name
StringTable.String: Doom Ray

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDoomRayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: An adaptation of the phaser particle emitter has resulted in massive improvements in the induced matter-breakdown reaction, making it effective against even the highest density armor. Also of note, our scientists are pretty sure the reaction won't consume the entire universe, so feel free to continue deploying it as you see fit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our beam weapons use a variety of systems to accumulate energy prior to the weapon firing. We've found that the capacity of these energy storage systems can be augmented by an external field, which although expensive, allows for increased beam output. Most interestingly, such fields can be theoretically projected at great distances, potentially improving the beam output of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyTransfer_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Transfer

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: After considerable study in the way that our beam weapons interact on a subatomic level with both shield systems and hulls, we've developed systems capable of reducing the effectiveness of enemy shields, or absorbing enemy beam attacks on our own vessels.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Magnification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHighEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: An improved understanding of the effects our beam augmentation fields have has resulted in the possibility of even greater beam output. Our beam weapons have that funny smell again, but we don't hear many crew members complaining.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Conceptually simple, though there's no shame in that, missile-based weapons provide a tremendous amount of punch for their cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Rapid Fire Missiles

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the firing speed of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons engineers have determined that shooting more missiles at things makes them blow up faster. Which seems obvious in retrospect. Anyways, our missile launchers shoot more now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Missiles

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Missiles were always going to be the most cost-effective means of making things hurt, and now they're a little bit more so.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Reviews of training data and engagement encounters reveals one overriding request from the field. "We want more missiles. Give us more missiles." Well, having reduced the mass of our launchers and ammunition racks, we're now able to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHarpoonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Harpoons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesHarpoonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Harpoon class of missiles employ a number of improvements in speed, range, tracking and warhead yield, resulting in our most powerful conventional missile system yet.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarheadFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Acceleration

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarheadFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarheadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: More target drones have given their lives for our glory, and a careful analysis of their deaths has revealed some exciting possibilities in the field of shaped charges, which should improve the destructive yield of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarheadFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarheadFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarheadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The most delicate part of missile manufacturing was the warhead, for obvious reasons. The latest generation of ultra-stable explosives should reduce both manufacturing costs and workplace accidents significantly.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarheadFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarheadFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesWarheadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of shaped-charge warheads to reduce the weight of each individual missile, with no corresponding loss of destructive power, we can make room for more missile launchers in total.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPhotonicWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Photonic Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPhotonicWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the biggest downsides to missile-based technology is that much of the energy is expended on the outer surface of enemy vessels. By including with our warheads a device which releases a high energy burst of photons at the moment of impact, we can achieve substantial penetration against both armor and shield systems, greatly increasing their destructive potential.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPayloadMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Missile Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPayloadMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPayloadMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our missile manufacturing facilities are now almost perfectly efficient, wasting no material whatsoever. Destruction shouldn't come so cheap, yet here we are.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPayloadMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPayloadMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPayloadMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Modeling of the subatomic interactions our warheads make upon detonation against various hull and shield systems has revealed the possibility of making lighter, more efficient warheads.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPhotonTorpedos_Name
StringTable.String: Photon Torpedos

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPhotonTorpedos_Dec
StringTable.String: By matching a wide-spectrum version of the photon-encasement armor-piercing technology with our latest antimatter warheads, we've created a weapon with truly colossal damage potential. They glow a new color too.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesNightmareTorpedoTech_Name
StringTable.String: Nightmare Torpedoes

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesNightmareTorpedoTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare torpedo contains a tiny singularity trapped in a pocket universe until the moment of impact, which upon being released causes horrifying damage to anything foolish enough to be standing by a place we're firing something called Nightmare torpedo's at.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMissileAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have come up with a number of ship- or starbase-based sensor systems which can improve the tracking, and ultimately the range, of our missiles.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesAdvancedMissileGuidance_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Missile Guidance

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesAdvancedMissileGuidance_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved decoy and adaptive camouflage systems have greatly increased the survivability of our missiles when faced with point defense systems. And our ship and starbase based guidance systems now feature a number of predictive systems, allowing for more efficient missile flight paths which should help boost their range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIntelligentWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligent Warheads

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesIntelligentWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Cluster warheads are capable of overwhelming and neutralizing enemy point defense systems. And our fleet-based guidance systems, along with the latest generation of information-sharing "pilot" missiles, will allow for even more efficient guidance and improved range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: There's just something nice and honest about a projectile, isn't there? And thanks to a little help from teams of massive electromagnets, we've now got some extremely fast projectiles to work with.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Range Extention

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A switch to slightly smaller projectiles, along with improved energy delivery systems, has led to significant improvements in the speed of each projectile, and thus the effective range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Never before have we needed to make electromagnetic coils in such quantities, and the early days of kinetic weapons were plagued by supply-chain problems. But supply has finally ramped up to meet demand, and we should see cost savings across all associated kinetic weapons programs.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experimentation with the winding patterns of our electromagnetic coils has revealed a number of subtle synergistic effects which we can take advantage of, leading to tighter, more compact coils, and ultimately, lower mass weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPulseCannonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pulse Cannons

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesPulseCannonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Research efforts to emit tight clusters of particles at rapid velocities has led to a weapon which gets around some of the practical limitations of slug-based mass drivers. Called pulse cannons, they have similar tactical characteristics as previous generations of kinetic weapons. They're just much more powerful.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAccelerationFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Frictionless Acceleration

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAccelerationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAccelerationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of superconductors have enabled us to deliver energy to our weapon systems much more rapidly. The trade off is smaller projectiles, though as they'll be launched at higher velocities, the destructive potential will be similar, and the weapons will have a much longer effective range.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAccelerationFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAccelerationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAccelerationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of superconducting electromagnetic coils, and their less-strenuous cooling requirements, make them much less fragile to handle. We expect to see significant cost savings now that we won't break as many during production.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAccelerationFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAccelerationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAccelerationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our new ultra-low resistance electromagnets generate a lot more kick per unit weight, leading to lower mass accelerators. So feel free to cram more of them into whatever you're cramming them into.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesGravitonThrower_Name
StringTable.String: Graviton Thrower

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesGravitonThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: By synthesizing and launching pulses of gravitons at the enemy, we can induce massive shifts in the local gravity of the ship systems they strike. This will cause incredible amounts of damage and probably make anyone standing nearby feel really dizzy. Before they die.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Accelerator Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: "We Make Kinetic Weapons Faster," is probably the dumbest slogan ever conceived of, but the factory workers seem really proud of it, so no-one had the heart to tell them. And to be fair, they do make them really quite quickly now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have all but mastered kinetic weapons and are approaching the limits of the field, making them as mass efficient as theoretically possible.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesQuantumDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Drivers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesQuantumDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum Drivers fire shells that contain small quantum fields which pull in a tremendous amount of mass from a neighboring dimension on impact. We're not sure which dimension. We can only hope that they didn't need that mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSingularityDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Singularity Drivers

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesSingularityDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: The pinnacle of kinetic weapon technology, these launch micro-singularities that collapse out of existence shortly after impact. These are bad news, the worst news really, for anyone who can't get out of the way.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesKineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Inertial dampening should be impossible in this universe, which is why we were a little surprised we were able to pull it off. We've used this stroke of luck to create systems which can boost the velocity and effective range of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMassManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Mass Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesMassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: We've modified our inertial modification technology to actually fit inside the projectiles, which are now capable of generating ultra-dense outer surfaces for a brief period adding massive armor penetrating capabilities. Additionally, we've made improvements to our fleetwide inertial modification systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInertialMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: Inertial Magnification

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInertialMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our inertial modifying projectiles are now capable of attacking the enemy's armor directly, creating low density fissures throughout it, causing the whole structure to splinter if struck properly. Additionally our fleetwide inertial modifying systems have been more or less perfected, subjecting anything which menaces one of our fleets with the prospect of facing a deadly hailstorm. Of death.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefenseSystemTech_Name
StringTable.String: Defense Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Naval officers are notoriously squishy and otherwise difficult to protect in a ship that operates in hard vacuum. But we've got to try, otherwise the squishy officers will stop getting into the ships.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefensiveSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefensiveSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of shields.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefensiveSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Deflecting or diffusing incoming weapon fire is really, really hard; and we're far from having a really good understanding of it. Our latest round of research has only succeeded in making existing systems a bit cheaper to build.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefensiveSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefensiveSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefensiveSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Making our point defenses fire more crap into the space around the ship is a simple solution to a complicated question. Though a surprisingly effective one.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefensiveSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Specialization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefensiveSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of armor.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesDefensiveSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By adjusting the size and positioning of our armor panels, we've been able to minimize overlap and other inefficiencies, and can now provide the same level of protection to our ships for less overall weight.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer must our ships cower behind crude deflector fields. The latest generation of shields, although expensive, are capable of stopping incoming attacks outright, rather than just deflecting or diffusing their impact.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Enhancment

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Of all the suggestions we've received from the field on how to improve our shield systems, "Please make them bigger," seemed to be their most common. So we've done that.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We probably shouldn't talk in front of the troops about our efforts to make our shield systems cheaper, even if it means more shields to go around for everyone. Because that's not how they'll see it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The first few generations of field emitters used in our shield systems were incredibly bulky and cumbersome. And they still are, frankly. Just a bit less so now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierFieldGeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier Field Generation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shielding technology, the so called Barrier Field, provides a number of improvements over previous systems. Now capable of absorbing a portion of the energy which strikes it, this dramatically increases the energy efficiency of the system, allowing for ultimately much more powerful shields.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierSystemFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierSystemFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierSystemFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The first generation of energy absorbers in our Barrier Field systems used a model of capacitor which occasionally exploded violently. Crews had decidedly mixed feelings about this, so we replaced those capacitors with a slightly more robust model.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierSystemFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierSystemFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierSystemFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: After the first few prototypes went out the door, we've been able to achieve some economies of scale in the manufacture of our Barrier Field systems, reducing the cost of shield components.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierSystemFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierSystemFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesBarrierSystemFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We've recently been able to shave a ton of weight off our shield generators thanks to the latest generation of superconductors and their less extensive cooling requirements.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesForceFieldTech_Name
StringTable.String: Force Fields

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesForceFieldTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesForceFieldTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shields are capable of directing vast amounts of additional energy to a specific section of shields within nanoseconds of the moment of impact, allowing for shields which are much stronger relative to their respective weight.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Shield Assembly

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Cheaper shields never meant less effective shields, and it's only taken a few decades for our troops to finally understand that. Which is good, because our shields are spectacularly cheap now.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: It's impossible to make the energy emitters of our shields any denser, our engineers now claim. They claim that kind of thing a lot and always take it back later, but they seem pretty sure this time.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInvulnerabilityTech_Name
StringTable.String: Invulnerability

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesInvulnerabilityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: "Invulnerable" may be a bit of an exaggeration. Our researchers allow that some theoretical weapons could penetrate these shields, but those would be some pretty terrifying weapons. Even then you'd rather be behind this shield than not.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in the focusing capabilities of our shield generators has given us the ability to generate and augment shields at a distance. This should provide massive tactical and strategic options for fleet operations.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: The same technology we've used to generate shields at a distance can now be done with our Barrier Field systems, allowing for even greater improvements in fleet survivability.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_PiratesEnergyFieldManipulation_Dec
